QuestData.Title: Shadowprey Village
QuestData.Description: Hello again, $c.$b$bI have received news that Shadowprey Village is in need of some assistance. Our hands are more than full here, so I must call upon you to travel there and be of assistance to them.$b$bThe village lies on the coast to the southwest of here. When you arrive, seek out the one named Mai'Lahii.
QuestData.LogDescription: Karnum Marshweaver wants you to speak with Mai'Lahii.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome to Shadowprey Village, $r.$b$bI was not sure the Cenarion Circle would send anyone.
